SummaryOfDirectChrtblActyGrp.Description1Txt: Modern Elections & Money in Politics ProgramThrough the Modern Elections & Money in Politics Program, Democracy Fund supports research, promotes dialogue, and highlights ways to improve elections administration and campaign finance. Democracy Fund's aim is to help build consensus around the solutions that serve the needs of the American people and that boldly advance the will of voters. We aim to reduce barriers to voting, improve integrity and public trust in the electoral system, and reduce the dependency of our leaders on special financial interests.
SummaryOfDirectChrtblActyGrp.Description2Txt: Vibrant Media & Public Square ProgramThrough the Vibrant Media & Public Square Program, Democracy Fund supports innovations and institutions that are reinventing local media and expanding the public square to ensure that people can access diverse sources of information and different points of view. We seek to support media models that serve the needs and preferences of communities today. We support efforts to combat misinformation and develop new venues for reasoned debate and public deliberation.
SummaryOfDirectChrtblActyGrp.Description3Txt: Principled Leadership & Governance ProgramThrough the Principled Leadership and Governance Program, Democracy Fund works to foster better, more trusting relationships among political leaders and encourage civility to increase their capacity to work together to solve problems. We seek to create new incentives and tools that help leaders work together and demonstrate that it is possible to govern without abandoning core principles or ignoring substantive disagreements
SummaryOfDirectChrtblActyGrp.Description4Txt: Special ProjectsThrough our Special Projects, Democracy Found works to: strengthen investigative journalism and defend the role of a robust, free press in our public square; foster a just and inclusive society and protect those Americans whose civil rights and safety appear to be endangered in this emerging landscape; and ensure government accountability and protect our system of checks and balances.

GeneralExplanationGrp.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: General Explanation Supplemental Information for Form 990-PF
GeneralExplanationGrp.MediumExplanationTxt: +Form 990PF, PART VIIB, LINE 1a(3) During the period ended December 31, 2017, affiliated entities and related parties provided in-kind services including financial manager fees of $225,000 and other expenses of $56,065. The total amount of these contributed services is valued at $281,065 but was not recorded on Form 990-PF.
